def_cn: (玩具或装置)装有发条的
def_en: A clockwork toy or device has machinery inside it which makes it move or operate when it is wound up with a key.

def_cn: 很顺利地;准时地；很有规律地
def_en: If you say that something happens like clockwork, you mean that it happens without any problems or delays, or happens regularly.
